# My Peak Ecosystem (v2026)

This is a DeepTech sports analytics platform.

## Architecture
- **Astro 5.0**: Landing page (apps/web)
- **Next.js 15**: SaaS Dashboard (apps/core)
- **Payload 3.0**: Headless CMS (apps/cms)
- **Tailwind CSS v4**: Shared Design System

## Tech Stack
- Package Manager: pnpm
- Monorepo: Turborepo
- Styling: OKLCH Colors, Geist/Inter Fonts
